A group built application that connects friends! Post, share, upload - images - songs and video links. Comment and like your friends post. Post your own story or checkout your friends story. Implemented Material UI components for a pleasant user experience. Utilized AWS/S3 to store images, mp3/mp4. SociaLista - Project Github
